original_text: You must make the flowers and the branches from the same piece of pure gold as the lampstand. Use a hammer to make the gold into the right shape.
korean_text: 그 꽃받침과 가지를 줄기와 연결하여 전부를 순금으로 쳐 만들고

sentences.original_text: and the branches from the same piece
of pure gold as the lampstand
sentences.korean_translation: 성막의 등대와 같은 순금으로 만들어야 하며

sentences.original_text: to make the gold into the right shape
